itunes:title: Dark Book Club, Book Picks to Keep the Book Club Conversation Flowing
title: Dark Book Club, Book Picks to Keep the Book Club Conversation Flowing
description:
In Episode 18 of Book Talk, Etc. Tina and Renee are sharing a few books they think would make great selections for dark book club! They share what they're loving lately, their latest reads, a shelf addition, and have book talk about what they think it means to have a dark book club conversation and share some of their dark book club recommendations .

*Support us on Patreon ! We would love for you to join our Book Talk community! We have great bonus content including bonus episodes, Zoom get togethers, an engaging private Facebook group to interact with other listeners and more for just $5 a month!Â 

Â *The book titles listed are linked to Amazon Affiliates, where we make a small commission from qualifying purchases (at no cost to you). Thanks for your support!

Loving Lately
9:30 Pronounce App (R)
12:00 Glisten & Glow Top Coat Nail Polish (T)

Latest Reads
15:29 Confessions | Kanae Minato (T)
19:08 When Ghosts Come Home | Wiley Cash

Book Talk
31:15 The Blinds | Adam Sternbergh
34:39 Assembly | Natasha Brown
41:07 Never Let Me Go | Kazuo Ishiguro
45:29 What Remains | Carole Radziwell
54:43 The First Day of Spring | Nancy Tucker
60:00 These Women | Ivy Pochoda

Shelf Additions
1:04:37 Admissions | Kendra James
1:06:29 The Vanishing Point | Elizabeth Brundage

Other Mentions
8:30 The Last Castle | Denise Kiernan
8:55 Vanderbilt: The Rise and Fall of an American Dynasty | Anderson Cooper
Currently Reading Podcast
Brei (our patron mentioned @sweethoneyandbrei)
It | Stephen King
The Grim Sleeper killer case - Rolling Stone article
